segments.text: I feel happy watching the children trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, reaching up to the cookie jar with a plate in his hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing nearby, waiting for a cookie with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be having fun, even if they are being a bit sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate, completely unaware of what the children are doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's cute how the children are working together to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the water is pouring onto the floor, but the children don't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water streaming down the cabinets, creating a slippery hazard, but the children are focused on their mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their excitement and teamwork make me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they can get the cookies without any accidents happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
